header.title: Another racist video goes viral

header.postText: Another racist video has gone viral on social networking sites. This time showing two white motorists in a rant with two black traffic officers in Potchefstroom in the North West. The footage shows one of the occupants taunting and assaulting an officer after being pulled over for inspection.. . . . For more news, visit: http://www.sabc.co.za/news
